briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study Comparing the Effects of Intravenous Epoetin Hospira and Epoetin Alfa [Epogen] (Amgen) in Patients With Chronic Renal Failure Requiring Hemodialysis and Receiving Epoetin Maintenance Treatment. AiME - Anemia Management With Epoetin
officialTitle: A Therapeutic-equivalence Study Comparing The Efficacy And Safety Of Intravenous Epoetin Hospira And Epoetin Alfa (Amgen) In Patients With Chronic Renal Failure Requiring Hemodialysis And Receiving Epoetin Maintenance Treatment
summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate therapeutic equivalence of IV Epoetin Hospira compared to IV Epogen (Amgen), based on maintenance of Hb levels and study drug dose requirements in patients treated for anemia associated with chronic renal failure and on hemodialysis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Weekly Hemoglobin Level From Week 21 to Week 24
